sen.j: 尾上 松助（おのえ まつすけ）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡の一つ。
sen.e: "Matsusuke ONOE" is one of professional names used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Matsusuke ONOE" is a professional name used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
sen.cmt: one of professional names→a professional nameとしました。
sen.e: "Matsusuke ONOE" is a professional name used by Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
Their yago (stage family name) is Otowa-ya.

sen.j: - 新派の俳優春本泰男の子。
sen.e: He was a son of Yasuo HARUMOTO, an actor of a theater company called Shinpa (New School).

sen.j: 尾上松緑 (2代目)の部屋子。
